languages.text: "Ха! Да когда это благородные пытались договориться со сбродом?" {n}Солдат осекается.{/n} "Одним словом — нет, не пытался. Ну и по правде... кажется мне, не помогло бы это. С этим бунтом не все так просто..."

"Ha! When has any noble ever tried negotiating with riffraff?" {n}The soldier bites his tongue.{/n} "Which is to say no, he hasn't. And to tell you the truth... I don't think it would've helped. There's more to this rebellion than meets the eye..."
languages.original_text: "Ха! Да когда это благородные пытались договориться со сбродом?" {n}Солдат осекается.{/n} "Одним словом — нет, не пытался. Ну и по правде... кажется мне, не помогло бы это. С этим бунтом не все так просто..."

traits.locale_text: "Ha! When have nobles ever tried negotiating with riff-raff?" {n}The soldier bites his tongue.{/n} "Which is to say no, he hasn't. And to tell you the truth... I don't think it would've helped. There's more to this rebellion than meets the eye..."

"Ha! When have nobles ever tried negotiating with riff-raff?" {n}The soldier bites his tongue.{/n} "Which is to say no, he hasn't. And to tell you the truth... I don't think it would've helped. There's more to this rebellion than meets the eye..."

"Ha! When have any noble ever tried negotiating with riffraff?" {n}The soldier bites his tongue.{/n} "Which is to say no, he hasn't. And to tell you the truth... I don't think it would've helped. There's more to this rebellion than meets the eye..."

"Ha! When have any noble ever tried negotiating with riffraff?" {n}The soldier bites his tongue.{/n} "Which is to say no, he hasn't. And to tell you the truth... I don't think it would've helped. There's more to this rebellion than meets the eye..."

"Ha! When has any noble ever tried negotiating with riffraff?" {n}The soldier bites his tongue.{/n} "Which is to say no, he hasn't. And to tell you the truth... I don't think it would've helped. There's more to this rebellion than meets the eye..."

"Ha! When has any noble ever tried negotiating with riffraff?" {n}The soldier bites his tongue.{/n} "Which is to say no, he hasn't. And to tell you the truth... I don't think it would've helped. There's more to this rebellion than meets the eye..."

languages.text: "Ha! Wann hat ein Adliger je versucht, mit Pöbel zu verhandeln?" {n}Der Soldat beißt sich auf die Zunge.{/n} "Will sagen, nein. Und ehrlich gesagt ... hätte es vermutlich auch nicht geholfen. Es steckt mehr hinter dieser Rebellion, als es den Anschein hat ..."
languages.original_text: "Ha! When has any noble ever tried negotiating with riffraff?" {n}The soldier bites his tongue.{/n} "Which is to say no, he hasn't. And to tell you the truth... I don't think it would've helped. There's more to this rebellion than meets the eye..."

traits.locale_text: "Ha! Wann hat ein Adliger je versucht, mit Pöbel zu verhandeln?" {n}Der Soldat beißt sich auf die Zunge.{/n} "Will sagen, nein. Und ehrlich gesagt ... hätte es vermutlich auch nicht geholfen. Es steckt mehr hinter dieser Rebellion, als es den Anschein hat ..."

languages.text: « Ha ! Des nobles ont-ils jamais tenté de négocier avec la plèbe ? » {n}Le soldat se mord la langue.{/n} « Non, il n'en a rien fait. Et à dire vrai... Je doute que ça ait changé quoi que ce soit. Cette révolte cache quelque chose... »
languages.original_text: "Ha! When has any noble ever tried negotiating with riffraff?" {n}The soldier bites his tongue.{/n} "Which is to say no, he hasn't. And to tell you the truth... I don't think it would've helped. There's more to this rebellion than meets the eye..."

traits.locale_text: « Ha ! Des nobles ont-ils jamais tenté de négocier avec la plèbe ? » {n}Le soldat se mord la langue.{/n} « Non, il n'en a rien fait. Et à dire vrai... Je doute que ça ait changé quoi que ce soit. Cette révolte cache quelque chose... »

languages.text: “哈！贵族哪会和乡巴佬谈判啊？”{n}士兵咬了咬舌头。{/n}“也就是说，总督显然没谈判过。而且老实说……我觉得谈判恐怕没什么用，这场叛乱比我们看到的要复杂得多……”
languages.original_text: "Ha! When has any noble ever tried negotiating with riffraff?" {n}The soldier bites his tongue.{/n} "Which is to say no, he hasn't. And to tell you the truth... I don't think it would've helped. There's more to this rebellion than meets the eye..."

traits.locale_text: “哈！贵族哪会和乡巴佬谈判啊？”{n}士兵咬了咬舌头。{/n}“也就是说，总督显然没谈判过。而且老实说……我觉得谈判恐怕没什么用，这场叛乱比我们看到的要复杂得多……”

languages.text: 「へっ！貴族がゴロツキたちと交渉しようとしたことが今までにあったのですか？」{n}兵士は舌を噛んだ。{/n}「つまり、そんな事は一度も無かった、と。実を言うと…そんなことをしても何の役にも立たないと思うのです。この反乱には見えない要因があるんじゃないかと…」
languages.original_text: "Ha! When has any noble ever tried negotiating with riffraff?" {n}The soldier bites his tongue.{/n} "Which is to say no, he hasn't. And to tell you the truth... I don't think it would've helped. There's more to this rebellion than meets the eye..."

traits.locale_text: 「へっ！貴族がゴロツキたちと交渉しようとしたことが今までにあったのですか？」{n}兵士は舌を噛んだ。{/n}「つまり、そんな事は一度も無かった、と。実を言うと…そんなことをしても何の役にも立たないと思うのです。この反乱には見えない要因があるんじゃないかと…」

languages.text: «¡Ja! ¿Cuándo ha intentado algún noble negociar con gentuza?». {n}El soldado se muerde la lengua.{/n} «Es decir, no, no lo ha hecho. Y a decir verdad... No creo que hubiera ayudado. Hay más en esta rebelión de lo que parece...».
languages.original_text: "Ha! When has any noble ever tried negotiating with riffraff?" {n}The soldier bites his tongue.{/n} "Which is to say no, he hasn't. And to tell you the truth... I don't think it would've helped. There's more to this rebellion than meets the eye..."

traits.locale_text: «¡Ja! ¿Cuándo ha intentado algún noble negociar con gentuza?». {n}El soldado se muerde la lengua.{/n} «Es decir, no, no lo ha hecho. Y a decir verdad... No creo que hubiera ayudado. Hay más en esta rebelión de lo que parece...».

languages.text: "Peh! Soylular ne zaman çapulcularla pazarlık etmiş?" {n}Asker dilini ısırıyor.{/n} "Yani hayır, bulunmadı. Ayrıca doğruyu söylemek gerekirse... Bence işe de yaramazdı. Bu isyanın arkasında görünenden fazlası var."
languages.original_text: "Ha! When has any noble ever tried negotiating with riffraff?" {n}The soldier bites his tongue.{/n} "Which is to say no, he hasn't. And to tell you the truth... I don't think it would've helped. There's more to this rebellion than meets the eye..."

traits.locale_text: "Peh! Soylular ne zaman çapulcularla pazarlık etmiş?" {n}Asker dilini ısırıyor.{/n} "Yani hayır, bulunmadı. Ayrıca doğruyu söylemek gerekirse... Bence işe de yaramazdı. Bu isyanın arkasında görünenden fazlası var."
